item.title: My First Post
item.description: Install Linux Mint 20.2 and Applications Install snap on Linux Mint $ sudo rm /etc/apt/preferences.d/nosnap.pref $ sudo apt update $ sudo apt update $ sudo apt install snapd Install hugo on Linux Mint https://snapcraft.io/install/hugo/mint $ sudo snap install hugo Install and Use Visual Studio code on Linux Mint 20 https://linuxhint.com/install-visual-studio-code-linux-mint Install Chrome on Linux Mint 20 https://linuxhint.com/install_google_chrome_linux_mint-2 Install 注音輸入法 https://foxbrush.pixnet.net/blog/post/60608917 Install 倉頡輸入法 $ sudo apt-get install fcitx-table-cangjie5 Install notepad-plus-plus sudo snap install notepad-plus-plus Install git $ sudo apt install git update git to new version $ sudo add-apt-repository -y ppa:git-core/ppa $ sudo apt-get update $ sudo apt-get install git -y Install docker https://www.
